title: Laughs on abilities are super cool, and here's why.
body:
I think laughs that are put on abilities give some champions a lot of extra personality.
While not changing anything gameplay wise they still somehow make abilities a lot more satisfying.
What I mean by this is, as example Viktor on his E, it feels super evil and satisfying.
Vladimir and TFs E laugh are super arrogant. Skarners ult laugh is vicious in a cool way.
Taliyahs ult laugh is cute as hell, chaotic (which her whole concept about not fully controllable earth magic is anyway) and just simply funny to hear. I think you get the idea. Laughs on abilities are super cool when they work out and fit a champions personality, which most do.
So I really hope this is kept up in some champion designs, just because it is a really cool way to improve the personality of a champion by quite a bit. May just be me who likes these little kind of details. ^^

It's the fact that it's reserved to ultimate abilities/long cooldowns and is subtler, less loud and generally less distracting.
